oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Results of plant nutrient balances in the BERAS countries : Finland
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Granstedt, Artur
Seuri, Pentti
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
Crop husbandry
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Finnish study was conducted on five BERAS-farms; two in the cereal-dominated south, one in the centre(Tampere), one in the animal-dominated north-west(Österbotten)and one in the east (Juva). In addition a more detailed study of eight farms located in the Juva region has been carried out.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Granstedt, Artur and Seuri, Pentti (2005) Results of plant nutrient balances in the BERAS countries : Finland. In: Granstedt, Artur; Thomsson, Olof and Schneider, Thomas (Eds.) Environmental impacts of eco-local food systems - final report from BERAS work package 2. Ekologiskt lantbruk, no. 46. Sveriges lantbruksuniversitet, Centrum för uthålligt lantbruk, pp. 28-29.
